name: zobi
slogan: A new way to protect your home from cybercrime – every person, every device
description:
AI, IDS, IoT, Zigbee, Z-Wave… all this jargon stresses us out and we’re cybersecurity experts. We created Zobi Home Intelligence to make it easy for anyone to detect and prevent cybercrime in their home.

Zobi’s not just Artificial Intelligence, it’s Home Intelligence. Our smart, brand-agnostic solutions take a holistic view of homes - people, devices, networks, habits. They build an anonymous profile for each home, then use that intel to spot unusual behaviour and stop cybercriminals.

Learn more at http://zobi.ai

jobs.title: Part time CTO
jobs.description:
We are an IoT Cyber Security startup, looking for a part-time CTO with the possibility of going full-time after 3 months.

You should be sufficient in:

SaaS development
Agile lifecycle
Internet of Things
Zigbee and other WiFi technologies

Your responsibilities will include:

Vetting, shortlisting and selecting a development partner for our IoT Intrusion Detection System.

High-level architecture design of the solution.

Validation of developer low-level designs.

Reporting to founder on development blockers and progress.
